title: Extender
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014193532/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014193532/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Extender**

The projecting parts of letters extending from letter bodies. Most commonly, the [ascenders](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014193532/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ascender) and [descenders](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014193532/http:/typophile.com/wiki/descender) of the [bowl pairs](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014193532/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bowl%20pairs) **b-q** and **d-p** , **g** , the descender of **y** , and also the [ear](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014193532/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ear) of [binocular](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014193532/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Binocular) form lower case **g**.
author: James Arboghast
